name: 'A Bitter Epilogue' CD + Shirt package deal*
description:
*Limited time offer. Package deal is also available with the Classic white Deathbox shirt. 

DEATHBOX proudly unleashes their new cd entitled A BITTER EPILOGUE. Their debut on Crossfirecult Records contains half an hour of earth trembling metal packed into seven very diverse songs with twisted structures and relentless riffage. 

In contrary to what the title of the new cd seems to suggest A BITTER EPILOGUE is the start of a new era for Deathbox. Itâ€™s their first release after they evolved from a powerful four-piece to an even stronger quintet and it shows how the Deathbox-sound has gotten even better with the addition of an extra guitarplayer.
